snippet.title: Blood West, stealth FPS western with horror vibes coming to Steam Early Access on February 10!
snippet.description:
Wishlist Blood West on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1587130/Blood_West

With immersive stealth-shooter gameplay, weird west horror vibes, and throwback FPS aesthetics, Blood West will please S.T.A.L.K.E.R., Thief, and System Shock fans looking for a new, action-filled challenge.

In Blood West, there truly is no rest for the wicked. An outlawed gunslinger finds himself brought back to life by strange native spirits. They set him on a quest to find the root of the strange occult curse that has befallen the frontier. His soul will find no peace, and his body won’t rest, until he purges the land of abominations it has spawned.

Drawing inspiration from classic series like S.T.A.L.K.E.R. and Thief, the game promotes stealth, observation, careful planning, and sensible resource management. Yet, with some experience, right combination of acquired perks, and armed with a Winchester rifle or a sawed-off shotgun, the player will be wrecking gory havoc among the fiends and monsters.

Steam Early Access launching on February 10, 2022.
Media & Content Creator review keys - via Keymailer.

Follow Hyperstrange on Twitter: https://twitter.com/HYPERSTRANGE

Wishlist Blood West on Steam, and be notified of the launch: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1587130/Blood_West
